verbose_text: In order to confirm that GFP expression faithfully reflected Mx1 expression, we performed intracellular staining for Mx1 and GFP in Mx1 gfp / Mx1 + heterozygous mice (from the B6.A2G-Mx1 + congenic line); however, GFP fluorescence was lost upon permeablization for staining (data not shown) as reported by others.
